ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a developer passionate about creating digital solutions that combine exceptional functionality with attractive design. With experience in modern technologies, I specialize in building scalable web applications and memorable user experiences.

ECOMMERCE.TITLE: E-commerce Platform
ECOMMERCE.DESCRIPTION: Complete e-commerce platform with shopping cart, payments, and administration panel.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Analytics Dashboard
DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Modern dashboard with real-time data visualizations and interactive reports.

SERVICES.TITLE: Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: I offer comprehensive digital solutions to boost your business: web development, mobile apps, and robust APIs.

WEB.TITLE: Web Development
WEB.DESCRIPTION: Modern, responsive, and SEO-optimized websites with the latest technologies.

MOBILE.TITLE: Mobile Apps
MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: Native and hybrid apps for iOS and Android with an exceptional user experience.

BACKEND.TITLE: Backend & APIs
BACKEND.DESCRIPTION: Development of robust and scalable APIs with modern and secure architecture.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Let's work together!
CONTACT.PITCH: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it and help you bring it to life.

FOOTER.NAME: Oswaldo
FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences.

HERO.NAME: Oswaldo
